name: Light AA Gun Pack
detailed_description:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic anti-aircraft guns from 1940



No subscription is required to purchase or play this content. This is a one time purchase pack.

Gain access to the light anti-aircraft pack so you can spawn at mobile spawns, army bases and forward bases to attack enemy aircraft, trucks and infantry! These light AA guns can take down planes with accurately placed fire power. They're easily towed and are fast to move around and deploy.

This pack includes...

  • British Hotchkiss 25mm AA Gun
  • United States CA mle 38 25mm AA Gun
  • French CA mle 38 25mm AA Gun
  • German FlaK30 (20mm) AA Gun

Upon purchase you'll be able to play them instantly as it only requires Rank 1!

short_description: Gain access to the light anti-aircraft pack so you can spawn at mobile spawns, army bases and forward bases to attack enemy aircraft, trucks and infantry! These light AA guns can take down planes with accurately placed fire power. Deploy-able at mobile spawns!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
